TEXT.S:
kasulin micaliw tu lebung adada' ku tangila
sapuelac ngatu cacay anu mikacawkami tu kasulin, kya kasulin macaliwtu lebungsaca buhangsa, caay haw kisu adada' ku tangila? kanahantu matengil tu ku suni',caay tu kapah ku suni', caay kasiwatanku suni' haw? kya mahiza saw? uyniyan sa, u tangila nu mita, ilabu' a tangila, sipiatepnay bali kya. izaw ku duhpicay a telis, kya ngangan nu hulam sa, u "kumuo".
ilabu' nu kumuo maziket tulu a wukak, taneng patudu'ninelnu kumuo, tina kakitizaan singangan ku "teban-tangila".
i demiad sa, u bali-sapiatepnu teban-tangila mahiza nu hekalay, taneng sapalalen. nika anu ihekalay a bali-sapiatep tasul talakaw saca puenel sa, uyniyan a sapiatep caay tu sapalalen, bucici tu ku talakaway a bali-sapiatep tayza puenelay-sapiatep. ku kumuo talabu' saca tahekal, caay tu kakapah ku tangila nu mita.
ngatuc tusa micumud tu lebung ku kasulin, kya bali-sapiatep tansul amatasasa', talakaw tu ku bali-sapiatep ilabu' nu teban-tangila, uzama sa, bucici tu ku kumuo nay labu' tahekal. sisa, adada' tu ku tangila nu mita. mahiza tu mikacaw tu hikuki, tapabaw ku hikuki, adada' tu ku tangila nu mita. usakasa, mapuenel ku bali-sapiatep ihekal nu hikuki. u belih sa, anu mikacaw kami tu tianti(:), tansul sa tasasa' kya tianti, tansul talakaw ku bali-sapiatep nu tianti. bucici kumuo nay hekal talabu', mahiza sa, adada' tu ku tangila nu mita. musepi, sihusu matulinteban-tangil atu cihe-salaedan(salaedan), u tangila-takulaw-husu. pisuwab saca pienuc taneng mibuhat tu tangila-takulaw-husu, miedap sapalaen bali-sapiatep nu teban-tangil aut hekal-tangila. anu mahiza sa, caay tu kaadada' ku tangila.
namakayniyan a nasulitan nasakamuwan atu natinengan Wikipayke paybalucu'ay pulungamin a cudad- Protein behind hearing 3D Ear page Details of various ear problems Ear wiggling mechanism unmasked Cotton swabs can pose serious health risk: coroner from ctv.ca nasulitan nay pabalucu'ay a kawaw nu subana'ay a pu 2018-1, nasulitan ni Tuku Sayun.
